title: The Male Lead Is the Best Medicine for Insomnia! - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Enemies Become Lovers   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   Kingdoms   Magic   Nobles   Royalty   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: 초록거울
description:
Rayleigh transmigrated into an imperial princess who can’t sleep because of black magic. The only way she can sleep is by touching Ian, the male lead and the master of the original book.

Well, there’s a problem. First, Ian is the duke of the enemy country. Second, Ian doesn’t easily show his kindness to people because of his past trauma. Rayleigh is forced to hide her identity and infiltrate Ian’s castle as a “personal maid.”

Rayleigh, who is looking for Ian’s niche every night, and Ian comes to suspect her identity. Hiding different innermost thoughts, the two are getting closer, and the black wizards are threatening them……… 

Can Rayleigh cure her insomnia? 

A healing romance between a princess disguised as a maid and a traumatized Duke.>
